    • seeInventory

      public boolean seeInventory(InventoryMode inventoryMode, Foe foe)
      Shows inventory and related options to player. Receives foe as parameter in combat mode.
      Parameters:
      inventoryMode -
      foe -
      Returns:
      boolean - if hero still has turn ( hero loses turn if they use or equip an item ).

      public void updateStats(int[] stats, Foe foe)
      Applies damage invalid input: '&' DoT to foe, healing to self.
      Parameters:
      stats - - Array of stats to update ( 0 -> Damage, 1 -> DoT, 2 -> Healing ).
